snippet: The Social Democrats formally nominated Peer Steinbrück to run for chancellor, despite controversy over $1.7 million he earned from speaking fees.
lead_paragraph: The Social Democrats formally nominated Peer Steinbrück to run for chancellor, despite controversy over $1.7 million he earned from speaking fees.

headline.seo: Social Democrats Formally Nominate Merkel Rival
headline.main: Rival to Merkel Is Officially Seeking Her Job
headline.print_headline: Rival to Merkel Is Officially Seeking Her Job
